event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: SW INCR
event.name: Software increment
event.description: Software increment. Instruction architecturally executed (condition code check pass).

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, exception return

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, write to CONTEXTIDR

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Mispredicted or not predicted branch speculatively executed

event.title: Memory
event.name: Memory Error
event.description: Local memory error. This event counts any correctable or uncorrectable memory error (ECC or parity) in the protected core RAMs.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Writes to TTBR
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed (condition check pass) - Write to TTBR

event.title: Counter chain
event.name: Odd Performance
event.description: For odd-numbered counters, increments the count by one for each overflow of the preceding even-numbered counter. For even-numbered counters there is no increment.

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 Cache allocate
event.description: L2 data cache allocation without refill.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Branch Retried
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, branch. This event counts all branches, taken or not. This excludes exception entries, debug entries and CCFAIL branches.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Branch mispredicted retried
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, mispredicted branch. The event counts any branch counted by BR_RETIRED which is not correctly predicted and causes a pipeline flush.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Frontend Stall
event.description: No operation issued because of the frontend. The counter counts on any cycle when there are no fetched instructions available to dispatch.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Backend Stall
event.description: No operation issued because of the backend. The counter counts on any cycle fetched instructions are not dispatched due to resource constraints.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Level 1 data TLB access
event.description: This event counts any load or store operation which accesses the data L1 TLB.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Level 1 instruction TLB access
event.description: his event counts any instruction fetch which accesses the instruction L1 TLB.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Attributable L3 data
event.description: This event counts any full cache line write into the L3 cache which does not cause a linefill, including write-backs from L2 to L3 and full-line writes which do not allocate into L2.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Attributable Level 3 unified cache refill
event.description: The event counts for any cacheable read transaction returning data from the SCU for which the data source was outside the cluster.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Attributable Level 3 unified cache access
event.description: The event counts for any cacheable read transaction returning data from the SCU, or for any cacheable write to the SCU.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Attributable L2 data
event.description: The event counts on any refill of the L2 TLB, caused by either an instruction or data access. This event does not count if the MMU is disabled.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Attributable L2 data
event.description: The event counts on any access to the L2 TLB (caused by a refill of any of the L1 TLBs). This event does not count if the MMU is disabled..

event.title: Cache
event.name: Remote access
event.description: Access to another socket in a multi-socket system.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Access data TLB
event.description: Access to data TLB that caused a page table walk. This event counts on any data access which causes L2D_TLB_REFILL to count.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Access to instruction TLB
event.description: Access to instruction TLB that caused a page table walk. This event counts on any instruction access which causes L2D_TLB_REFILL to count.

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 data write-back
event.description: L1 data cache write-back cleaning and coherency

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data clean
event.description: L2 data cache write-back, cleaning and coherency

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data refill read
event.description: L2 data or unified TLB refill, read

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data refill write
event.description: L2 data or unified TLB refill, write

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data access read
event.description: L2 data or unified TLB access, read.

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data access write
event.description: L2 data or unified TLB access,write

event.title: Bus
event.name: Bus access read
event.description: The event counts for every beat of data transferred over the read data channel between the core and the SCU.

event.title: Bus
event.name: Bus access write
event.description: The event counts for every beat of data transferred over the write data channel between the core and the SCU.

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: LDREX
event.description: Exclusive operation speculatively executed, LDREX, or LDX

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX pass
event.description: Exclusive operation speculatively executed, STREX or STX pass.

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX fail
event.description: Exclusive operation speculatively executed, STREX, or STX fail

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX
event.description: Exclusive operation speculatively executed, STREX or STX.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Load/Store
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, load or store

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Integer
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, integer data processing

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Advanced SIMD
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, Advanced SIMD instruction

event.title: Instruction
event.name: PC write
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, software change of the PC.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Undefined exception count
event.description: Counts the number of undefined exceptions taken locally.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Data abort
event.description: Exception taken locally, Data Abort and SError.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Secure Monitor Call
event.description: Exception taken locally, Secure Monitor Call.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Instruction Abort not taken locally
event.description: Exception taken, Instruction Abort not taken locally.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Data Abort not taken locally
event.description: Exception taken, Data Abort or SError not taken locally.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Other traps not taken locally
event.description: Exception taken, Other traps not taken locally.

event.title: Exception
event.name: IRQ not taken locally
event.description: Exception taken, IRQ not taken locally.

event.title: Exception
event.name: FIQ not taken locally
event.description: Exception taken, FIQ not taken locally.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Release operation executed
event.description: Release consistency operation speculatively executed, load-acquire

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Release operation executed
event.description: Release consistency operation speculatively executed, store-release.
